headline: ‘Buckle up!’: CNBC anchor shocked as US trade deficit plunges to lowest since 2009. How to take advantage in 2026
summary: It’s the smallest trade deficit since June 2009.

headline: Kroger Announces the Sale of Vitacost.com, Inc.
summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced the sale of its subsidiary, Vitacost.com, Inc., an eCommerce retailer of health and wellness products, to iHerb. The transaction closed on January 8.

raw.headline: Kroger Announces the Sale of Vitacost.com, Inc.
raw.summary: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR) today announced the sale of its subsidiary, Vitacost.com, Inc., an eCommerce retailer of health and wellness products, to iHerb. The transaction closed on January 8.

headline: iHerb Strengthens Growing Domestic Business with Acquisition of Vitacost from Kroger
summary: Strategic Transaction Accelerates iHerb’s U.S. Business and Solidifies Commitment to the Vitamins, Minerals and Supplements CategoryIRVINE, Calif., Jan. 09, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- iHerb Holdings, LLC, one of the world’s largest online retailers specializing in health and wellness, today announced that it has completed its acquisition of Vitacost.com, Inc. (“Vitacost”) from The Kroger Co. (“Kroger”). This acquisition is expected to significantly accelerate iHerb’s market presence in the U.S. an

headline: Kroger sells Vitacost as it sharpens focus on core grocery business
summary: The sale of the online health and wellness retailer to iHerb follows several moves by the grocer to make its operations leaner and more store focused.
